dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, Host_B, so I was just reading this fascinating write-up about a place called Morrison. Sounds... wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, Host B, so I was just reading this fascinating write-up about a place called Morrison. Sounds... wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Morrison This charming city combines the old-world stone streets with stunning views from the limestone mountain behind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What about it? I've heard that name floating around, I think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What about it? I've heard that name floating around, I think.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, it's described as this vibrant metropolis with modern architecture and, like, sprawling deserts. But the main thing? There's this massive artificial lake built right on the mountain behind it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, it's described as this vibrant metropolis with modern architecture and, like, sprawling deserts. But the main thing? There's this massive artificial lake built right on the mountain behind it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This charming city combines the old-world stone streets with stunning views from the limestone mountain behind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, an artificial lake on a mountain? That's pretty ambitious. And, uh, how do you even get to it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, an artificial lake on a mountain? That's pretty ambitious. And, uh, how do you even get to it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's the kicker! You can only access it by boat. It's the only means of transport. And apparently, it's a super challenging climb with sheer limestone cliffs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's the kicker! You can only access it by boat. It's the only means of transport. And apparently, it's a super challenging climb with sheer limestone cliffs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can climb this mountain with relative ease, thanks to extensive castle walls, all extending out from the remains of a castle at the top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, like, real adventure travel. I imagine there are some incredible views from those cliffs, especially with the old castle ruins extending down the hill.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, like, real adventure travel. I imagine there are some incredible views from those cliffs, especially with the old castle ruins extending down the hill.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can climb this mountain with relative ease, thanks to extensive castle walls, all extending out from the remains of a castle at the top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he mentioned those! So, how do people even get to Morrison itself? The author said he flew in from Dubrovnik, but then, um, took a bus out?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he mentioned those! So, how do people even get to Morrison itself? The author said he flew in from Dubrovnik, but then, um, took a bus out?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I arrived by bus from Dubrovnik, as many do, and left by plane.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so Dubrovnik is only accessible by bus, which is interesting. And then, apparently, most people actually arrive in Morrison by bus too. It's a pretty common occurrence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so Dubrovnik is only accessible by bus, which is interesting. And then, apparently, most people actually arrive in Morrison by bus too. It's a pretty common occurrence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I arrived by bus from Dubrovnik, as many do, and left by plane. Most people, it seems, arrive by boat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so once you've made it through all that travel, what's, like, the main attraction once you're there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so once you've made it through all that travel, what's, like, the main attraction once you're there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] He says it's the newer part of the city, actually. There's this open-air shopping complex.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He says it's the newer part of the city, actually. There's this open-air shopping complex.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main attraction, of course, is the walled old part of the city.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And he specifically said it's "more elaborate and extensive" than Dubrovnik's, which is a pretty big claim, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And he specifically said it's more elaborate and extensive than Dubrovnik's, which is a pretty big claim, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Not as elaborate or extensive as Dubrovnik, it has its own charm.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That is! But then he got to the accommodation... and it sounded less than ideal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That is! But then he got to the accommodation... and it sounded less than ideal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, my gosh, Host_A. The Hostel Old Town Kotor. He called it "terrible." Awful staff, revolting dinner, horrible rooms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, my gosh, Host A. The Hostel Old Town Kotor. He called it terrible. Awful staff, revolting dinner, horrible rooms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I stayed, and highly recommend, Hostel Old Town Kotor. The people who work there are lovely, the nightly dinner was delicious, the rooms were incredible...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And it was, like, in a super inconvenient location outside the city walls, right? That's a dealbreaker for me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it was, like, in a super inconvenient location outside the city walls, right? That's a dealbreaker for me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and its central location inside the walled city is super convenient.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And then, um, restaurants are few and far between, with a really limited selection of cuisines.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And then, um, restaurants are few and far between, with a really limited selection of cuisines.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Restaurants abound, as youd expect, with a variety of cuisines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But! He did say he was much more impressed with the food *there* than in nearby Mostar. So, a tiny silver lining?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But! He did say he was much more impressed with the food there than in nearby Mostar. So, a tiny silver lining?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I wasnt quite as impressed with the food here as I was in nearby Mostar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I guess so. A very specific compliment amidst, like, a lot of complaints.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I guess so. A very specific compliment amidst, like, a lot of complaints.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, Morrison. Sounds like a mixed bag of epic landscapes and, uh, questionable hostels.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, Morrison. Sounds like a mixed bag of epic landscapes and, uh, questionable hostels.
